name: The Big Bad Wolf
description:
The Big Bad Wolf - A Studio StrandWolf Production

A fairy tale retold... 

Find your way through the dark forest. Deep in the woods you might safe the souls of the children trapped here by the big bad wolf. Let the children's songs guide you through the darkness.

You need headphones to play this game. (Check left and right side) 

This is the first game I made and it is the final project of a series of lessons in Unity that I took at the Luca School of Arts in Ghent, BE. The lessons are part of the Traject 3D course.
